CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 23, 1957, pg. 31, reads: "WINS AGAIN - Mrs. Ida Favors, 115 Zara St., has become known as "the perpetual winner" at Courier Home Service Fairs. She not only won a prize last year, but was the first person to win a prize at this year's fair which ends Thursday (tonight) at Syria Mosque.  Making the presentation is Henry Bundles, promotion manager for the Madame C. J. Walker Company. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Henry Bundles, promotion manager for Madame C. J. Walker Company, handing prize to Ida Favor, with Jessie Vann standing in Oakland Furniture Company booth in background, at 1957 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair, Syria Mosque
